title: Ep167 Zoological Crimes
description: This week, the gals gab about some so-called zoos gone wild. Topics include least chubs, an ill-informed collector with a terrible vendetta, and why they didn't just put Jumanji away. Twist open a bottle of Firelands Pinot Grigio, roll a twelve, and tune in for Zoological Crimes. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
